item.title: ALIT
item.description: score:174 Chances: Alight Worklife’s latest release delivers AI-driven workforce support and extensive benefits management, showing potential for future growth and innovation. The sale of Alight’s Professional Services segment and Payroll & HCM Outsourcing businesses for up to $1.2 billion to H.I.G. Capital demonstrates strategic agility and competitiveness, positioning the company for enhanced technology and financial performance.
